title: Define project scope and requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the EthicalDilemmaVR project. This includes defining the types of ethical scenarios to be covered (e.g., dilemmas related to privacy, honesty, fairness, etc.), user experience expectations (immersive, interactive, educational, reflective), target audience demographics (age, profession, interest in ethics, VR experience), technical specifications for the VR environment (hardware recommendations: PC, VR headset, controllers; software requirements: game engine, programming language), desired interactivity (dialogue options, decision-making mechanisms, real-time feedback), ethical guidelines (sources, principles, case studies), and any other relevant aspects that will contribute to the success of this project. Ensure collaboration with team members throughout the process.

title: Design the VR environment
description: Create a detailed design for the virtual reality environment, including the user interface, graphics, and interaction mechanisms.

title: Develop ethical scenario models
description: Research and develop models for various ethical scenarios, including the decision points, consequences, and underlying moral philosophies.

title: Implement VR environment
description: Develop the virtual reality environment based on the design, including graphics rendering, user input handling, and integration with the ethical scenario models.

title: Develop user tracking and analytics
description: Implement a system to track user interactions, decisions, and feedback within the VR environment for analysis and improvement.

title: Create documentation and tutorials
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and tutorials to guide users through the VR experience and explain the underlying ethical concepts.

title: Implement security measures
description: Ensure the VR environment and user data are secure by implementing appropriate security measures, such as encryption and access controls.

title: Set up testing and QA processes
description: Establish testing and quality assurance processes to ensure the VR environment, ethical scenarios, and user experience meet the project requirements.

title: Plan deployment and infrastructure
description: Develop a plan for deploying the VR environment, including the required infrastructure, hosting, and distribution channels.

title: Conduct user testing and feedback
description: Organize user testing sessions to gather feedback on the VR experience, ethical scenarios, and overall effectiveness of the project.
dependencies: Set up testing and QA processes
